comment: The hamster wheel of American Nationalist excuse-making for the Trump Administration is a wonder to behold, the world's first perpetual motion device. Everything you would think would slow it down only speeds it up. These rabid hamsters gang up on and cannibalize any hapless hamster that slows down a bit or tries to climb off.

Everything you would think would slow it down only speeds it up. These rabid hamsters gang up on and cannibalize any hapless hamster that slows down a bit or tries to climb off.

      :snt1 (w / wonder

                        :ARG0 (p / political-movement

                                    :op1 "Nationalist")

                                          :op1 "America")))

                        :ARG2 (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (a / administrate-01)
                              :mod (p2 / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Trump")))))
            :ARG1-of (b / behold-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)))
      :snt2 (s / speed-up-02
            :ARG0 (e2 / everything
                  :ARG1-of (t / think-01
                        :ARG0 y)
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / slow-down-03
                        :ARG1 (ii / it)
                        :ARG1-of t
                        :ARG0 y)))
      :ARG1 ii
      :mod (o / only)
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (g2 / gang-up-02
                  :ARG0 (h2 / hamster
                        :mod (r / rabies)
                        :mod (t2 / this))
                  :ARG1 (h3 / hamster
                        :mod (a3 / any)
                        :ARG1-of (h4 / hapless-00)
                        :ARG0-of (s3 / slow-down-03
                              :degree (b2 / bit))
                        :ARG0-of (t3 / try-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / climb-01
                                    :ARG0 h3
                                    :direction (o2 / off)))))
            :op2 (c3 / cannibalize-01
                  :ARG0 h2
                  :ARG1 h3)))
